sign_up.title: Welcome to Rose Inc
sign_up.title_without_discount: Sign up to be reminded when this live shopping event starts
sign_up.title_with_discount_with_asterisk: Sign up to unlock an additional exclusive offer*
sign_up.title_after_stream: Sign up to hear about upcoming live shopping events
sign_up.subtitle_migration: Please set a new password.  We will then send you a confirmation email.
sign_up.referral_discount_asterisk: *Registered accounts are eligible for discounts on applicable products when two friends sharing a personal invite link sign in and attend the same live shopping event.
sign_up.attendance_discount_asterisk: *Registered accounts are eligible for discounts on applicable products when you sign in and attend the live shopping event.
sign_up.tos_reminder_html: By continuing or signing up you are agreeing to our Terms of Service.
sign_up.tos_reminder_accepts_marketing_html: By signing up via the "continue with" options or continuing to share your information you are affirmatively "opting-in" to the terms of service, this site's privacy policy, and agree to receive emails and communications.

sign_in.title: Welcome Back
sign_in.announcement_social_cancelled: You cancelled signup via a social provider - please try again
sign_in.announcement_account_created: Your account has been created - you can now sign in
sign_in.announcement_email_confirmed: Thank you for confirming your email address - you can now sign in to your account
sign_in.announcement_password_changed: Your password has been changed - you can now sign in to your account
sign_in.already_signed_in_as: You are signed in as {{ who }}.

sign_out.error_please_reload: Something went wrong. Please reload the page.

change_password.title: Change Password
change_password.must_sign_in: You must be signed in to change your password
change_password.social_cannot_change: You are logged in via a social provider, so we are not able to change your password.
change_password.social_enquire_provider: Please check with your account provider.

forgot_password.title: Forgot your password?
forgot_password.reset_link_message: We will send a reset link to this email address.

body.signed_in: You're already signed in. If you know your password, then visit {{change_password}}
body.not_signed_in: If you know your password, then visit {{change_password}}

forgot_password.must_activate: You must activate your account before you can change the password; we have sent you another confirmation email.
forgot_password.click_link: Please click on the link sent to your email address to activate your account.
forgot_password.click_link_then_reset: Please click on the link sent to your email address to activate your account. You will be able to reset your password afterwards.

forgot_password_submit.title: Reset password
forgot_password_submit.reset_link_message: A password reset link has been sent to your email address.
forgot_password_submit.reset_link_new_message: A new reset link has been sent to your email address.
forgot_password_submit.click_link: Click the link to reset your password

errors.account_exists_native: An account already exists for this email address; please try signing in with your email and password.
errors.account_exists_google: An account already exists for this email address; please try signing in via Google.
errors.account_exists_facebook: An account already exists for this email address; please try signing in via Facebook.
errors.account_exists_other: An account already exists for this email address from a different sign-in method; please try another sign-in method.
errors.email_already_in_use: Something seems off. An account with this email already exists.
errors.email_mismatch: The email addresses you entered do not match
errors.signup_unexpected: Sorry, an error occurred trying to sign you up.  Please try again later.
errors.signin_unexpected: Sorry, an error occurred trying to log you in.  Please try again later.
errors.social_provider_email_denied: We are unable to access your email address; please make sure you have not denied access to your email address from your social provider, or try another sign-in method.
errors.incorrect_login: Want to try again? This email address or password is incorrect.

incorrect_user_jsx.body: Want to try again? This email address or password is incorrect.

errors.incorrect_old_password: That's not quite it. Your old password is incorrect.
errors.incorrect_confirmation: Could not confirm your account with this link; please request another confirmation email and try again.
errors.incorrect_reset: Could not change your password with this link; please request another reset email and try again.
errors.invalid_email: We're not familiar with this email. Please enter a valid email address.
errors.invalid_password: We have really high standards, especially when it comes to security. This password doesn't meet our requirements.
errors.invalid_password_input: We have really high standards, especially when it comes to security. This password doesn't meet our requirements.
errors.invalid_old_password: We have really high standards, especially when it comes to security. Your old password doesn't meet our requirements.
errors.invalid_new_password: We have really high standards, especially when it comes to security. Your new password doesn't meet our requirements.
errors.invalid_old_or_new_password: Hold on — both passwords must be valid to continue.
errors.invalid_value: Give it another go. You must enter a valid value.
errors.missing_email: We didn’t quite catch that. Please enter an email address to continue.
errors.missing_password: Wait a minute — you must enter a password to continue.
errors.no_change_password: We hate to be the bearers of bad news, but we're unable to change your password at this time. Please try again later.
errors.reset_invalid: Better late than never — but this reset link has expired. Please check your email inbox for a new one.
errors.reset_password: Our team updated your password to keep it secure, but resetting it is easy. Just check your email inbox for a reset link.
errors.non_existent_account: No account exists with this email address.
errors.disabled_account: This account has been disabled: please contact support for more information.
errors.confirmed_account: This account has already been confirmed: you do not need a confirmation email.
errors.unconfirmed_account: This account has not yet been confirmed: please request a confirmation email.
errors.too_many_resend_signup: Failed to send email: This operation has been tried too many times, so we have temporarily restricted access. Please try again later.
errors.email_opt_save_error: An error occurred while saving your marketing preference.  Please try again later.

shade_finder.title: Shade Finder
shade_finder.choose_model: Choose a model that best matches your skin tone
shade_finder.choose_model_not_1st: Choose another model that best matches your skin tone

intro.subtitle: Identify the ideal shade for your skin tone

selfie.description_start: Take a photo to begin shade analysis.
selfie.description_best_results: For best results, use natural lighting and pull hair away from face.
selfie.description_disclaimer_html: Your privacy is important to us. Temporary Shade Finder images are used in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
selfie.error: We’re having trouble scanning your photo. Please click Retake to try again
selfie.error_loading: There was a problem loading the camera. Please make sure your camera is set up correctly and reload the page try again, or try without the camera instead.
selfie.error_permission: We failed to use your camera. Please make sure you have allowed permission to access your camera and refresh the page to try again, or try without the camera instead.
selfie.error_disabled: Failed to start camera - please check that you have not disabled access to the camera in your browser. Once you have re-enabled the camera you can refresh the page to try again, or try without the camera instead.

email_capture.title: Your results are ready
email_capture.subtitle: We'll send your shade match to your inbox.
email_capture.terms_html: By entering your email address, you agree to our Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions

skin_coverage.title: Which Do You Prefer?
skin_coverage.description: Tell us your desired coverage so we can recommend the best product for you.

veins.title: How do the veins on your wrists appear in daylight?
veins.description: Your undertone is the hue that appears from beneath the skin's surface to affect the overall complexion. Skin tone can change with seasons and other factors, but an undertone is constant.

sun.title: How does your skin react to the sun?
sun.description: The way your skin reacts to sun exposure is a good indication of undertone.

skin_concern.title: What is your main skin concern?

ingredients.title: Ingredients
ingredients.subtitle: We’re a clean brand, but our focus is on what goes into our formulas — not the 2,000 ingredients we leave out. We rely on clean active ingredients that deliver visible skincare benefits.

chat.title: Personal Assistance
chat.subtitle: Contact our Concierge Service for help with shade matching, product recommendations and more.

product.too_many_items_in_bag: You already have multiple items in your bag. Please check out before adding any more.

bag.addition_error: That item could not be added to your bag. Please try again later.
bag.retrieval_error: Your bag cannot be displayed. Please try again later.
